description: A childhood friend of Wakaba`s. When they were little, she recruited him as her "Onion Prince" to protect her from the taunts of her classmates. As he`s grown older, he`s come to regard Wakaba with affection, but she has since turned her attentions to her new "Prince", Saionji. Tatsuya is the only character who goes through Mikage`s confessional and is rejected as a duellist because his heart is "too pure" to be converted.
name: Kazami Tatsuya
